title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with Docker-like UX.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integrations.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models as drop-in LLM backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing fluent APIs and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails and Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin for VS Code powered by Ollama local models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes and examples for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, and edge devices.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart repository for running Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with Open WebUI, Postgres, and GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and typed APIs for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for local LLM demos.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node enabling no-code workflows with Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that brings local Ollama models into Discord servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.
